Eswatini: Major setback as Supreme Court upholds repressive Suppression of Terrorism Act

United Nations Support Mission in Libya (UNSMIL) statement concerning unilateral moves by Libyan actors

UNSMIL’s recent consultations with Libyan leaders and regional stakeholders to build consensus and streamline efforts to unlock the political stalemate, will continue

UNSMIL is following up with concern the recent unilateral acts by Libyan political actors and institutions, in the East, West and South.
